comments.author: Marvelman
comments.body: I would also like to mention prnt.sc. It provides a simple and quick way to capture and share images. When a user takes a screenshot with Lightshot app or browser plugin, the image is automatically uploaded to the prnt.sc website and assigned a unique URL that can be shared with others. They currently support .png, .bmp, and .jpg and you can uploads image files from your computer as well.Website: https://prnt.sc/Also, there is imgbox.com which can host JPG, GIF and PNG images up to 10MB each.Quoteimgbox is a free service with more than 7 years of history, empowering people to upload, share and enjoy images online.Website: https://imgbox.com/
